title: 147(3)(a)(iii)(II), 150(3)(c)(ii) and 262 of the Planning and Development Act
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

Regulations (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 19th day of June
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development regulation (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 19th day june

title: 147(3)(a)(iii)(II), 150(3)(c)(ii) and 262 of the Planning and Development Act
heading: Amendment of Planning and Development Regulations 2001
text_raw:
2025. 

Amendment of Planning and Development Regulations 2001

title: 147(3)(a)(iii)(II), 150(3)(c)(ii) and 262 of the Planning and Development Act
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001)
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001) 

are amended— 

(a) 

by the revocation of articles 56 to 65, 

(b) 

in article 180— 

(i) 

in sub-article (1), by the substitution of “section 150” for 
“sections 147 and 150”, and 

(ii) by the insertion of the following sub-articles after sub-

article (3): 

“(4) Subject to sub-article (5), the persons specified in 
subsection (2) of section 501 of the Act of 2024 are 
prescribed as persons to whom section 150 of the Act 
shall apply. 

(5) Sub-article (4) shall cease to have effect on, and 
from, the date of the adoption of the first code of conduct 
under subsection (1) of section 501 of the Act of 2024. 

(6) In this article— 

‘Act of 2024’ means the Planning and Development Act 
2024 (No. 34 of 2024); 

‘code of conduct’ shall be construed in accordance with 
subsection (1) of section 501 of the Act of 2024.”, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [263] 3 

(c) 

by the deletion of sub-article (1) of article 181, and 

(d) by the deletion of Form No. 1 in Schedule 11. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [263]

title: 147(3)(a)(iii)(II), 150(3)(c)(ii) and 262 of the Planning and Development Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by sections 105(9), 106(9), 147(3)(a)(iii)(II), 
150(3)(c)(ii) and 262 of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 
2000), these Regulations revoke and amend certain articles of the Planning and 
Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. No. 600 of 2001). 

 
 
 
 
 [263] 5
